title: Lupita Nyong'o's Father On His 'Wise' Daughter, Her Rising Fame
teaser: Peter Anyang Nyong'o is a Kenyan senator. He's also the father of Oscar-winning actress Lupita Nyong'o. He talks to host Michel Martin about his own history and his family's newfound fame.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
